{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3404457,"name":"Josue Raygoza","username":"Dragoon","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/9dc877/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-07-01T21:22:23.049Z","cooked":"

Hello! My team is trying to use these ArduCam IMX298 modules (amazon link) however the cables that came bundled in with them have broken. We have tried searching the internet to find some replacement cables but have been unsuccessful. The only information that we have is that the connector type it uses is called “ZHR-4”. If anyone have any information on where we could find some replacement cables it would be greatly appreciated if you could share!

I believe these should be what you need.
